participant_1.background:
I am not a good swimmer, but I try my best.
I'm a loner who likes to spend time with my dog.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am grateful for my family's support, but I need to make some changes to my lifestyle.

participant_2.background:
I'm a YouTube that's always hungry, so I spend my day looking for the best food videos to watch.
I'm a free spirit who is driven by my passion.
my favorite band is muse.
I used to be very closed off about my sexuality.
I am proud of my ability to find affordable and delicious food at the deli.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch food videos on YouTube and I love finding new music, what about you?
I like to spend time with my dog and create music. I also enjoy helping my clients with their taxes.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not very good at swimming, but I love hanging out with my dog.
What do you like to do with your dog?
We go on walks, play fetch, and just cuddle up on the couch. What kind of music do you like to make?
I love making all types of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
That's cool! I love Muse, they're one of my favorite bands.
Muse is great! What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is probably "Madness". What's yours?
Mine is "Uprising". It's such a powerful song.
I love that song too! I also love their song "Plug in Baby".
That's a great song! I love the guitar riff.
Me too! They're such a talented band.
